body_content.explanation: a form of street dance (= an informal style of dancing with energetic movements, done outside in the street or in nightclubs) that is usually done to hip-hop or similar music, and can include fast foot movements, spinning on the head or back, and balancing on the head or hands:
examples: They include many different dance forms from ballet to breakdance.
He dropped to the ground and executed an energetic breakdance.
I entered a breakdance competition at college.

body_content.explanation: to do breakdance (= a form of street dance that can include fast foot movements, spinning on the head or back, and balancing on the head or hands):
examples: If you like to breakdance, this is the club for you.
That was the first time he ever breakdanced.
The cartoon characters start break-dancing and rapping.
